Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when PSS padding is used and no
        hashing algorithm is provided.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = b'', b'', b'', enums.PaddingMethod.PSS
kwargs = {'signing_algorithm': enums.CryptographicAlgorithm.RSA,
    'hashing_algorithm': None, 'digital_signature_algorithm': None}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'A hashing algorithm must be specified for PSS padding.', engine.
    verify_signature, *args, **kwargs)
